snippet.textDisplay: If you saw this in '94, you would would have gone crazy of excitement. 3D software render like this was a huge deal and something completely new to the personal computer. Granted, it did not age well, but think of it as "pixel art" - it has it's charm.
snippet.textOriginal: If you saw this in '94, you would would have gone crazy of excitement. 3D software render like this was a huge deal and something completely new to the personal computer. Granted, it did not age well, but think of it as "pixel art" - it has it's charm.

snippet.textDisplay: +Sleepy Hound The art for this game is undoubtedly.. ehhhh. It's one of those games where you need to actually play it and see it in motion to experience its charm. It's an excellent game otherwise.
snippet.textOriginal: +Sleepy Hound The art for this game is undoubtedly.. ehhhh. It's one of those games where you need to actually play it and see it in motion to experience its charm. It's an excellent game otherwise.

snippet.textDisplay:
Joystiq just posted that LBA is getting a remake!  Depending on sales, could lead to LBA3!

If any game needs a modern comeback, it's this one.  It is a game series that, mechanically, hasn't aged well, but is still so memorable and enjoyable to play in that world..
snippet.textOriginal:
Joystiq just posted that LBA is getting a remake!  Depending on sales, could lead to LBA3!

If any game needs a modern comeback, it's this one.  It is a game series that, mechanically, hasn't aged well, but is still so memorable and enjoyable to play in that world..

snippet.textDisplay:
@Chinomareno 
OMG! I knooooow! :D
I remember beating up the kindergarteners and when they sobbed: "OW! My big brother's gonna take care of YOU!" I was like bring it ON! What's he gonna do, huh!?!? Then I'd throw spitballs at the elephant and as soon as I stepped outside, there'd be a LINE of older brothers there to beat me! >.<"
(Hated that I had to stand there and take it but I still would go back inside for revenge! heh heh :P)

Its a pretty old game, and had really good graphics for its time. Its about a guy named twinsun who tries to help his cidnapped friends from his homeplanet.
it has a great storyline and has never dissapointed me :). 

i hope its downloadable, cause i dont think its still available in stores.

Hail LBA2.

snippet.textDisplay: Wow, the cover seems real dorky, just threw me off after listening to soo many PS and Nintendo songs ahahahaha. Cool though, the tune is relaxing like I'm gonna go out for a nice walk. You really do listen and play a lot of different games, no biases it seems, good for you!

snippet.textDisplay: in America it's Called Twinsen's Odyssey ONE OF THE VERY FIRST VIDEO GAMES I EVER PLAYED...IT WAS SO COOL!!!....too bad my disk is all scratched up...now it just serves has a disk containing the files that you can launch with windows media player or stick in a  cd player to play the games music with no matter i'll just find and download the full game off the net of  corse  for that part ;)
